title: XMLHttpRequest (XHR)
summary: XMLHttpRequest (XHR) is a JavaScript API to create AJAX requests. Its methods provide the ability to send network requests between the browser and a server.

parents.title: MDN Web Docs Glossary: Definitions of Web-related terms
